types.html:
elles-mêmes f pl

  1. (emphatic) themselves

Usage notes

[edit]
  • Emphatic reflexive pronouns are used for extra emphasis where they are not grammatically required:
    elle l'a vu ― she saw it
    elle l'a vu elle-même ― she saw it herself
  • elles-mêmes is used for groups of all females or groups of nouns of all feminine gender

title: elles-mêmes
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /ɛl.mɛm/
